PluginData.Author: Viktor
PluginData.Tooltip: Allows loading blueprints of multiple sub-grids into projectors and welding them.
PluginData.Description:
This plugin allows to load blueprints of multiple sub-grids into projectors and welding the blocks.
Head/base blocks are added automatically as needed to connect subgrids.
For support join the SE Mods Discord: https://discord.gg/PYPFPGf3Ca
